attributes.additional_details: Why should the lives of those of us that support the Government's call for protecting ourselves and our fellow citizens by taking up the offer of a vaccination be jeopardised by those that stubbornly refuse to do so. If they have any other excuse than a genuine health reason they should not be entitled to enjoy the 'freedom' of travelling or visiting places where they put others at risk!
attributes.background: We want Government to introduce vaccination passports as compulsory but making provision for legal health exemptions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575297

If you would like the Government to create new restrictions relating to vaccine passports, we could accept a petition about this, but it would need to be clear what restrictions you wanted to be imposed.
